nodes.text: A mouthless green-skinned alien species lived in the galaxy. The species was humanoid in form. Two black eyes were set in its face, along with a pronounced nose. The species could be fed nutrients through a special suit.

During the Cold War, one member lived aboard the Colossus on the planet Castilon and liked to rest at Aunt Z's Tavern. The alien later watched the descent of the station into the ocean in a corridor with Jooks.
The species was created for the 2018 Star Wars animated series Star Wars Resistance, where a member of the species appears in several background scenes. The art asset was designed by Aaron Pham.
